data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting  Held On 10Th  February 2026.
data.news_body: The un-audited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025 was approved in the board meeting held today 10th February 2026 and the same is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 06.02.2025- Financial Results
data.news_body: The standalone un-audited financial results for the quarter ended 31.12.2024 along with limited review report was approved in the Board meeting held today. The same is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 08Th November, 2024
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) regulation 2015, Please find the enclosed standalone unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2024 along with Limited Review Report approved in the board meeting today - 08th November 2024

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 08Th August, 2024.
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 please find the enclosed the Standalone unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 30th June 2024 along with the limited review Report approved by the board of the directors in the meeting held today-08.08.2024

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 22Nd May, 2024
data.news_body: With reference to the above, please find enclosed the standalone Segment wise audited financial results for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2024 along with the auditor''s report as approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today, 22nd May, 2024.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 12Th February, 2024
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure requirements ) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the Standalone Unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2023 along with Limited review report of the Auditors.

data.caption: Results - Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 08Th November, 2023
data.news_body: With reference to the above, please find attached the Standalone Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th September, 2023 along with Limited Review Report of the Auditors.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 08Th November, 2023
data.news_body:
With reference to the above, please find enclosed the Standalone Unaudited Financial results for the Quarter ended 30th September, 2023 along with the Limited Review Report of the Auditors as approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today, 08th November, 2023.

We hereby inform you that the Board Meeting commenced at 4.00 PM and concluded at 5.15 PM.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June,2023
data.news_body: With reference to the above, please find enclosed the Standalone unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 30th June,2023 along with the limited review report of the auditors.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 23(9) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI LODR), we enclose herewith a statement on related party transactions of the Company for the half- year ended 31st March 2023 and the same is being made available on the website of the Company at www.robusthotels.in We request you to take the above on record and note the compliance under above referred regulation of SEBI LODR.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended 31St March,2023
data.news_body:
With reference to the above, please find enclosed the Standalone segment wise Audited Financial results for the Quarter and Financial year ended 31st March, 2023 along with the Auditors Report as approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today, 23rd May, 2023.

Pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, declaration by the company with respect to Auditors Report with unmodified opinion is also enclosed.

We hereby inform you that the Board Meeting commenced at 4.00 P.M and concluded at 6.10 P.M

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 23Rd May, 2023
data.news_body:
With reference to the above, please find enclosed the Standalone segment wise Audited Financial results for the Quarter and Financial year ended 31st March, 2023 along with the Auditors Report as approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today, 23rd May, 2023.

Pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, declaration by the company with respect to Auditors Report with unmodified opinion is also enclosed.

We hereby inform you that the Board Meeting commenced at 4.00 P.M and concluded at 6.10 P.M.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December,2022
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors at their meeting held on 13th February, 2023 approved the Standalone Unaudited Financial results for the Quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report of the Auditors, copy of which is enclosed for your records.
